languages.text: "При всем уважении к Вашей Светлости, но я — блюститель. Мне доводилось смотреть в глаза смерти, и я приму ваш приговор с достоинством". {n}В словах Хротко нет бравады, лишь сухая констатация.{/n}

"With all due respect to {mf|Your Lordship|Your Ladyship}, I am an enforcer. I have looked death in the eye, and I will accept your judgement with dignity." {n}There is no bravado in Hrotko's words, just a dry statement of fact.{/n}
languages.original_text: "При всем уважении к Вашей Светлости, но я — блюститель. Мне доводилось смотреть в глаза смерти, и я приму ваш приговор с достоинством". {n}В словах Хротко нет бравады, лишь сухая констатация.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "With all due respect to {mf|Your Lordship|Your Ladyship}, I am an enforcer. I have looked death in the eye, and I will accept your judgment with dignity." {n}There is no bravado in Hrotko's words, just a dry statement of fact.{/n}

"With all due respect to {mf|Your Lordship|Your Ladyship}, I am an enforcer. I have looked death in the eye, and I will accept your judgement with dignity." {n}There is no bravado in Hrotko's words, just a dry statement of fact.{/n}

"With all due respect to {mf|Your Lordship|Your Ladyship}, I am an enforcer. I have looked death in the eye, and I will accept your judgement with dignity." {n}There is no bravado in Hrotko's words, just a dry statement of fact.{/n}

languages.text: "Bei allem Respekt, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}, ich bin ein Enforcer. Ich habe dem Tod ins Auge geblickt und werde Euer Urteil mit Würde akzeptieren." {n}In Hrotkos Worten steckt keine Prahlerei. Sie sind einfach nur eine Feststellung.{/n}
languages.original_text: "With all due respect to {mf|Your Lordship|Your Ladyship}, I am an enforcer. I have looked death in the eye, and I will accept your judgement with dignity." {n}There is no bravado in Hrotko's words, just a dry statement of fact.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Bei allem Respekt, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}, ich bin ein Enforcer. Ich habe dem Tod ins Auge geblickt und werde Euer Urteil mit Würde akzeptieren." {n}In Hrotkos Worten steckt keine Prahlerei. Sie sind einfach nur eine Feststellung.{/n}

languages.text: « Avec tout le respect que je dois à Votre Seigneurie, je suis un prévôt. J'ai déjà regardé la mort dans les yeux, et j'accepterai votre jugement avec dignité. » {n}Vous ne décelez aucune bravade dans les paroles de Hrotko, juste une simple présentation des faits.{/n}
languages.original_text: "With all due respect to {mf|Your Lordship|Your Ladyship}, I am an enforcer. I have looked death in the eye, and I will accept your judgement with dignity." {n}There is no bravado in Hrotko's words, just a dry statement of fact.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Avec tout le respect que je dois à Votre Seigneurie, je suis un prévôt. J'ai déjà regardé la mort dans les yeux, et j'accepterai votre jugement avec dignité. » {n}Vous ne décelez aucune bravade dans les paroles de Hrotko, juste une simple présentation des faits.{/n}

languages.text: «Con el debido respeto, mi{mf|lord|lady}, soy un guardia. He mirado a la muerte a los ojos, y aceptaré su sentencia con dignidad». {n}No hay bravata en las palabras de Hrotko, solo una afirmación categórica.{/n}
languages.original_text: "With all due respect to {mf|Your Lordship|Your Ladyship}, I am an enforcer. I have looked death in the eye, and I will accept your judgement with dignity." {n}There is no bravado in Hrotko's words, just a dry statement of fact.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Con el debido respeto, mi{mf|lord|lady}, soy un guardia. He mirado a la muerte a los ojos, y aceptaré su sentencia con dignidad». {n}No hay bravata en las palabras de Hrotko, solo una afirmación categórica.{/n}

languages.text: 「失礼ですが、陛下、私はエンフォーサーです。死を直視したこともあります。誇りをもってあなたの裁きを受け入れましょう」{n}フロトコの言葉に虚勢はない。事実を淡々と述べているだけだ。{/n}
languages.original_text: "With all due respect to {mf|Your Lordship|Your Ladyship}, I am an enforcer. I have looked death in the eye, and I will accept your judgement with dignity." {n}There is no bravado in Hrotko's words, just a dry statement of fact.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「失礼ですが、陛下、私はエンフォーサーです。死を直視したこともあります。誇りをもってあなたの裁きを受け入れましょう」{n}フロトコの言葉に虚勢はない。事実を淡々と述べているだけだ。{/n}

languages.text: “恕我冒昧，大人。我是个执法者，已经亲眼目睹了太多死亡。我愿意心怀尊严，接受您的判决。”{n}赫洛卡的话语中没有任何虚张声势的意味，仅仅是在干巴巴地陈述事实。{/n}
languages.original_text: "With all due respect to {mf|Your Lordship|Your Ladyship}, I am an enforcer. I have looked death in the eye, and I will accept your judgement with dignity." {n}There is no bravado in Hrotko's words, just a dry statement of fact.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “恕我冒昧，大人。我是个执法者，已经亲眼目睹了太多死亡。我愿意心怀尊严，接受您的判决。”{n}赫洛卡的话语中没有任何虚张声势的意味，仅仅是在干巴巴地陈述事实。{/n}

languages.text: "Kusura bakmayın {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri ama ben bir infazcıyım. Ölümle göz göze gelmiş biriyim ve hükmünüzü şerefimle kabul edeceğim." {n}Hrotko'nun sözlerinde cesaret gösterisinden eser yok. Yalnızca hissiz bir şekilde gerçekleri beyan ediyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "With all due respect to {mf|Your Lordship|Your Ladyship}, I am an enforcer. I have looked death in the eye, and I will accept your judgement with dignity." {n}There is no bravado in Hrotko's words, just a dry statement of fact.{/n}
